thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Terry

author: Terry
title: Terry
text: I appreciated that they took my information and emailed me the details to go through. It helped me make the right decision and for me I need to see it. No pressure. When he asked if I was ready to book I just said, "No. I need to think a minute." That was it. So tired of tell people to back off the selling and just give me the info the way I like to get it. They realized I'm the client. I'll use them again.
